context.content: "Whatever Works" is a comedy-drama film directed by Woody Allen. It follows the story of a quirky, pessimistic New Yorker who forms an unlikely bond with a young, naive runaway from the South. The movie combines lighthearted comedy through the eccentric characters and their interactions, humorous comedy-drama as they navigate their differences and relationships, and intense drama as they confront personal challenges and growth.
